title: TO Greylock's Most Excellent Majesty.

book.title: The Ambiguities
book.description: 简介： IN old times authors were proud of the privilege of dedicating their works to Majesty. A right noble custom, which we of Berkshire must revive. For whether we will or no, Majesty is all around us here in Berkshire, sitting as in a grand Congress of V...
